remarks: Rearrange arguments in a commutative, associative operation. (Contributed by NM, 26-Aug-1995.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 30-Dec-2014.)
statement:
caovd.1 $e |- ( ph -> A e. S ) $.
caovd.2 $e |- ( ph -> B e. S ) $.
caovd.3 $e |- ( ph -> C e. S ) $.
caovd.com $e |- ( ( ph /\ ( x e. S /\ y e. S ) ) -> ( x F y ) = ( y F x ) ) $.
caovd.ass $e |- ( ( ph /\ ( x e. S /\ y e. S /\ z e. S ) ) -> ( ( x F y ) F z ) = ( x F ( y F z ) ) ) $.
caovd.4 $e |- ( ph -> D e. S ) $.
caovd.cl $e |- ( ( ph /\ ( x e. S /\ y e. S ) ) -> ( x F y ) e. S ) $.
caov42d $p |- ( ph -> ( ( A F B ) F ( C F D ) ) = ( ( A F C ) F ( D F B ) ) ) $.
$d A x y z $.
$d B x y z $.
$d C x y z $.
$d D x y z $.
$d F x y z $.
$d S x y z $.
$d ph x y z $.
